dictionary.definition: A fetish for witnessing others cry. Often a fetish of sadists who enjoy dominating submissive partners to the point of tears.
A dominant partner who is significantly older or who provides for the submissive partner in a variety of ways.
In an orgy when participants become physically linked in a string of sex acts. Often a feature of a bisexual orgy.
A gay man who is excessively stylish and perpetually worried about his appearance.
Excessively droopy labia minora. Synonyms: bacon stripes, beef curtains.
“Drug and disease free.” Often used on personals ads.
A negative feature of a potential sex or romantic partner that overrides all of his/her other attractive qualities, and which makes him/her undesirable.
One who routinely engages in vice, particularly of the sexual variety. Synonyms: libertine, rake, roue.
When a penis is jammed down a person’s throat during fellatio.
Synonyms: drop a bomb, drop a load, drop the kids off at the pool, dump, make a deposit, pinch a loaf, poop, pop a squat, take a dump, take a shit.
A fetish for being psychologically degraded, or degrading a partner. Synonyms: erotic humiliation.
A class of women known to be more promiscuous than the general population. Origins: a French word once used to describe prostitutes.
A fetish for having sex with trees.
Refers to a few types of denial play, including orgasm denial, bathroom denial, sensory denial, food/water denial.

A piece of latex or rubber stretched over a vagina or asshole during oral sex in order to prevent the transmission of STDs. One can be made by slicing a condom down the side and stretching the latex. Plastic wrap is a poor substitute, but it is better than nothing.
A threesome involving two men and one woman. This is not the type of threesome most men fantasize about, but it is what most settle for.
A person with a fetish for disabled people. The two most common fetishes devotees have are abasiophilia and acrotomophilia.

A common prop incorporated into age play or fetishes for infantilism, scat, watersports, humiliation, dominance, helplessness. Some believe this fetish develops early in life, when a child associates diapers with being loved and coddled.
1. Penis. 2. A man who behaves as if he does all his thinking with his penis.
